name: Encounter with the Starrelic
desc: All "Stargrail" monsters on the field gain 300 ATK and DEF. Once per turn, if a face-up "Stargrail" monster(s) you control is destroyed by battle, or leaves the field because of an opponent's card effect: You can target 1 "Stargrail" monster in your GY; Special Summon it in Defense Position.
